fields.name: scrcheck
fields.fieldText:
Check your Email


Thank you for updating your application.


We just sent you an email with the full details of your updated Application along with a new declaration.


The declaration needs to be signed and uploaded. Details are included in the email.

fields.name: confirmheader
fields.fieldText: Please review the information you have provided and press NEXT to save your application and proceed to the next step.

fields.name: Sites
fields.fieldText: Sites At Which The Unapproved Good Will Be Prescribed (List All Addresses)

fields.name: RiskManagementStrategy
fields.helpText:
How will risks associated with the use of the unapproved good by managed? This should address:


  1. Process of obtaining informed consent from patient.
  2. Monitoring and reporting that will be undertaken (include details of interval and duration of monitoring)
  3. Process of investigating and reporting adverse events

Please append Informed Consent Form (which will be signed by patients).
